name: bioplastic

plastic made from plant materials rather than oil: The environmentally friendly giftcard is made from bioplastic manufactured from corn. Most bioplastics break down in 90 to 180 days.
More examplesFewer examplesThey are experimenting with fabrics developed from corn-based bioplastics.The company has switched to using a bioplastic for its yoghurt pots.The plant produces 100 million pounds of bioplastic a year for such things as injection-moulded items, garbage bags and gardening.They grow a dedicated industrial crop solely for bioplastic and biofuel production.

made of plastic that comes from plant materials rather than oil: We tested five types of bioplastic shopping bags to see how biodegradable they are.
More examplesFewer examplesCompanies are marketing plant-based bioplastic packaging as “100-percent biodegradable”.By-products of grain processing have potential as bioplastic films and coatings for food.Consumers are willing to pay a premium for environmentally friendly goods, thereby encouraging manufacturers to use bioplastic resins.
